64158.en:
<voice 00245_00064158><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>...Behind the big door on the upper floor,
there must be a huge treasure, but how the
hell are we supposed to get in.<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64158.ja:
<voice 00245_00064158><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「……上の階にあった　ごっつい扉の向こうにゃ
　すっげえ宝が　眠ってるはずなんだが
　どうやって　入ったもんかなあ。<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64158.ko:
<voice 00245_00064158><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>: ……위층에 있던 큰 문 너머에는
　엄청난 보물이 잠들어 있을 텐데
　어떻게 들어가야 하나.<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64158.zh-Hans:
<voice 00245_00064158><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>……上层那扇厚实的门里面
一定藏着很值钱的宝贝，
但是怎么才能进去呢。<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64158.zh-Hant:
<voice 00245_00064158><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>……上面那扇厚重的門後面，
一定藏著很值錢的寶貝，
但要怎樣才能進去呢？<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64159.en:
<voice 00305_00064159><start_lip_sync n02210 _normal m00001>Woohoo. Treasure! Treasure!! I want it.
I want it!<stop_lip_animation n02210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64159.ja:
<voice 00305_00064159><start_lip_sync n02210 _normal m00001>「うひょひょっ。オタカラ！　オタカラ！！
　ほしっ。ほしいっ！<stop_lip_animation n02210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64159.ko:
<voice 00305_00064159><start_lip_sync n02210 _normal m00001>: 으헤헤. 보물! 보물!!
　갖고 싶다. 갖고 싶어!<stop_lip_animation n02210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64159.zh-Hans:
<voice 00305_00064159><start_lip_sync n02210 _normal m00001>哇哈哈。宝贝！宝贝！
我想要。我想要！<stop_lip_animation n02210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64159.zh-Hant:
<voice 00305_00064159><start_lip_sync n02210 _normal m00001>唔喲喲！寶貝！寶貝！！
我想要！我想要！<stop_lip_animation n02210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64160.en:
<voice 00363_00064160><start_lip_sync n02211 _normal m00001>Let's see if we can't break down that door
one more time, Captain Morva.<stop_lip_animation n02211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64160.ja:
<voice 00363_00064160><start_lip_sync n02211 _normal m00001>「もう一度　あの扉を壊せないか
　試してみましょうよ　モルバ団長。<stop_lip_animation n02211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64160.ko:
<voice 00363_00064160><start_lip_sync n02211 _normal m00001>: 문을 부술 수 없는지 한 번 더
　시도해 보죠, 모르바 단장님.<stop_lip_animation n02211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64160.zh-Hans:
<voice 00363_00064160><start_lip_sync n02211 _normal m00001>莫鲁巴团长，我们再试一次
看能不能弄坏那扇门吧。<stop_lip_animation n02211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64160.zh-Hant:
<voice 00363_00064160><start_lip_sync n02211 _normal m00001>莫魯巴團長，我們再試一次
看能不能破壞那扇門吧。<stop_lip_animation n02211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64161.en:
<voice 00501_00064161><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>That's right, isn't it, Wange and Jitora.
It's better to do than not to do it. That's
the desert mole motto, wasn't it!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64161.ja:
<voice 00501_00064161><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「そうだよな　ワンゲに　ジトラよ。
　やらないよりは　やっちまえ。
　それが　砂漠の土竜の　モットーだったよな！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64161.ko:
<voice 00501_00064161><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>: 그래. 완게, 지트라.
　일단 저지르고 보자.
　그게 우리 사막의 두더지의 좌우명이니까!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64161.zh-Hans:
<voice 00501_00064161><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>对啊，万格、吉特拉。
不管结果干了再说，
这才是我们沙漠土龙的信条！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64161.zh-Hant:
<voice 00501_00064161><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>對啊，萬格、吉特拉，
不管結果幹了再說，
這才是我們沙漠土龍的信條！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64162.en: <voice 00708_00064162><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>Argh! Who the hell are you!?<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64162.ja: <voice 00708_00064162><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「ぬひょあっ！　なんだ　貴様は！？<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64162.ko: <voice 00708_00064162><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>: 뜨헉! 넌 뭐냐!?<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64162.zh-Hans: <voice 00708_00064162><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>哇啊！你是什么人！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64162.zh-Hant: <voice 00708_00064162><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>哇啊！你是誰啊！？<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64163.en:
<voice 00938_00064163><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>...Aah? Didn't we break into Gran Zedora's
Royal Tomb... That's it, you son of a bitch!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64163.ja:
<voice 00938_00064163><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「……ああん？　グランゼドーラの王家の墓を
　荒らしませんでしたか……だと　このやろう！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64163.ko:
<voice 00938_00064163><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>: ……뭐? 그랑제도라의 왕가의 무덤을
　파헤친 적이 있냐……고!?<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64163.zh-Hans:
<voice 00938_00064163><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>……啊？你问是不是我们破坏了古兰泽朵拉的
王家陵墓……你这家伙有什么资格质问我们！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64163.zh-Hant:
<voice 00938_00064163><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>……啥？你問是不是我們破壞了古蘭澤朵拉的
王家之墓……你這傢伙有什麼資格質問我們！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64164.en:
<voice 01008_00064164><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>Aah, of course we broke into it! I heard
that the prince died and thought that this
was our chance to get the latest treasure!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64164.ja:
<voice 01008_00064164><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「ああ　荒らしましたとも！
　なんでも　王子が死んだって聞いたんでな。
　最新のお宝を　ゲットできるチャンスだろが！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64164.ko:
<voice 01008_00064164><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>: 암, 파헤쳤고말고!
　왕자가 죽었다는 소식을 들었으니까.
　따끈따끈한 보물을 얻을 기회잖아!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64164.zh-Hans:
<voice 01008_00064164><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>对，就是我们破坏的！
因为我们听说王子死了。
这可是大捞一笔的好机会啊！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64164.zh-Hant:
<voice 01008_00064164><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>對啊，就是我們破壞的！
因為我們聽說王子死了，
這可是大撈一筆的好機會啊！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64165.en:
<voice 01038_00064165><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>It was already unlocked for us, so we
sold everything we could. It's long gone
now, so give it up!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64165.ja:
<voice 01038_00064165><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「おあつらえ向きに　カギも開いてたしな。
　棺の中にあった物は　売りさばいた後だ。
　返せって言っても　返せねえから　あきらめな。<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64165.ko:
<voice 01038_00064165><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>: 때마침 문도 열려 있었고 말이지.
　관 속에 있던 물건은 이미 팔아 치웠어.
　내놓으라고 해도 못 주니까 포기해.<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64165.zh-Hans:
<voice 01038_00064165><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>正好门也没有锁上。
反正我已经把棺材里的东西都卖了。
让我还我也还不出来了。你就放弃吧。<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64165.zh-Hant:
<voice 01038_00064165><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>剛好門也沒上鎖。
反正我們已經把棺材裡的東西都賣了，
現在要我還也還不出來，你就放棄吧。<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64166.en:
<voice 01111_00064166><start_lip_sync n02211 _normal m00001>Look here, The captain's got his eyes set
on the treasure behind that door, so we
don't want you to get in the way.<stop_lip_animation n02211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64166.ja:
<voice 01111_00064166><start_lip_sync n02211 _normal m00001>「あのね。団長は今　このピラミッドの
　開かずの扉の向こうにある宝物に　ご執心なの。
　だから　邪魔しないでほしいわ。<stop_lip_animation n02211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64166.ko:
<voice 01111_00064166><start_lip_sync n02211 _normal m00001>: 이봐, 단장님은 지금 이 피라미드의
　잠긴 문 너머에 있는 보물에 여념이 없어.
　그러니까 방해하지 마.<stop_lip_animation n02211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64166.zh-Hans:
<voice 01111_00064166><start_lip_sync n02211 _normal m00001>而且啊，我们团长现在对这个金字塔中
紧闭之门里面的宝物非常执着。
所以希望你不要来捣乱。<stop_lip_animation n02211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64166.zh-Hant:
<voice 01111_00064166><start_lip_sync n02211 _normal m00001>告訴你，我們團長現在對這個金字塔
那扇緊閉之門裡面的寶物十分執著，
所以希望你別來搗亂。<stop_lip_animation n02211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64167.en:
<voice 01148_00064167><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>Oh yeah! You oughta seen that stone door.
To be closed that nice and tight, there's
gotta be something incredible waitin' for me!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64167.ja:
<voice 01148_00064167><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「おうよ！　貴様も見たろう　あの石室の扉を。
　あれほど　ガッチリと　閉じられた扉だ。
　ものすっげえ宝が　オレを待ってるのさ！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64167.ko:
<voice 01148_00064167><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>: 그래! 너도 봤겠지, 그 석실의 문을.
　그만큼 단단히 잠긴 문이라면
　엄청난 보물이 날 기다리고 있을 거라고!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64167.zh-Hans:
<voice 01148_00064167><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>没错！你也看见了吧，那个石室的门。
那扇门关得那么紧，
里面一定有很值钱的宝贝等着我呢！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64167.zh-Hant:
<voice 01148_00064167><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>沒錯！你也看見了吧？那個石室的門。
那扇門關得那麼緊，
裡面一定有很值錢的寶貝在等著我呢！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64168.en:
<voice 01198_00064168><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>That's how it is. We can't get caught now.
I don't know who you are, but you're going
to die here!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64168.ja:
<voice 01198_00064168><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「そうゆーことなんでな。
　今は　捕まるわけにゃ　いかねえ。
　何者かは知らねえが　ここで死んどけ！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64168.ko:
<voice 01198_00064168><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>: 아무튼 그런 상황이라
　지금은 붙잡힐 수 없어.
　누군지는 모르겠지만 여기서 죽어라!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64168.zh-Hans:
<voice 01198_00064168><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>就是这么一回事。
我现在可不能束手就擒。
虽然我不知道你是谁，不过你就死在这里吧！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64168.zh-Hant:
<voice 01198_00064168><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>就是這麼一回事，
我現在可不能被抓到。
雖然我不知道你是誰，不過你就死在這裡吧！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64169.ja: <voice 01422_00064169><start_lip_sync m08703 _normal m00001>「グゥルルルル……。<stop_lip_animation m08703 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64169.zh-Hans: <voice 01422_00064169><start_lip_sync m08703 _normal m00001>嗷嗷嗷嗷嗷嗷……<stop_lip_animation m08703 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64169.zh-Hant: <voice 01422_00064169><start_lip_sync m08703 _normal m00001>咕嚕嚕嚕嚕……<stop_lip_animation m08703 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64170.en:
<voice 01498_00064170><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>Hey, Grave Digger! Sink your teeth into the
enemy in front of you~~~!!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64170.ja:
<voice 01498_00064170><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「やれっ　グレイブディガー！
　目の前の敵を　食らいつくせ～～～っ！！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64170.ko:
<voice 01498_00064170><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>: 해치워라, 그레이브 디거!
　눈앞의 적을 먹어 치워라~~~!!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64170.zh-Hans:
<voice 01498_00064170><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>上吧！掘墓者！
把眼前的敌人都吃光！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64170.zh-Hant:
<voice 01498_00064170><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>上啊！掘墓者！
把眼前的敵人給我吃光～～～！！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64171.ja: <voice 01566_00064171><start_lip_sync m08703 _normal m00001>「ギャオオオオオンッ！！<stop_lip_animation m08703 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64171.zh-Hans: <voice 01566_00064171><start_lip_sync m08703 _normal m00001>嗷嗷嗷嗷嗷嗷！<stop_lip_animation m08703 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64172.en:
<voice 00380_00064172><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>You again... Us desert moles don't tolerate
anyone who gets in our way!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64172.ja:
<voice 00380_00064172><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「また　お前か……。
　オレたち　砂漠の土竜の邪魔をするヤツは
　誰であろうと　ゆるさねえ！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64172.ko:
<voice 00380_00064172><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>: 또 너냐…….
　우리 사막의 두더지를 방해하는 놈은
　누구든 용서 못 해!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64172.zh-Hans:
<voice 00380_00064172><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>怎么又是你……
任何人都不能阻碍
我们沙漠土龙！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64172.zh-Hant:
<voice 00380_00064172><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>怎麼又是你……
任何人都別想阻撓
我們沙漠土龍！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64173.en: <voice 00457_00064173><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>Get 'em, Grave Digger!!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64173.ja: <voice 00457_00064173><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「やっちまえ　グレイブディガー！！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64173.ko: <voice 00457_00064173><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>: 해치워라, 그레이브 디거!!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64173.zh-Hans: <voice 00457_00064173><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>给我上，掘墓者！！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64173.zh-Hant: <voice 00457_00064173><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>幹掉他！掘墓者！！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64174.ja: <voice 00542_00064174><start_lip_sync m08703 _normal m00001>「ギャオオオオオンッ！！<stop_lip_animation m08703 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64174.zh-Hans: <voice 00542_00064174><start_lip_sync m08703 _normal m00001>嗷嗷嗷嗷嗷嗷！<stop_lip_animation m08703 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64175.en: <voice 00018_00064175><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>...Awww. Grave Digger's done for...<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64175.ja:
<voice 00018_00064175><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「……あわわわわ。
　グレイブディガーが　やられちまった……。<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64175.ko:
<voice 00018_00064175><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>: ……으아아아아.
　그레이브 디거가 쓰러졌잖아…….<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64175.zh-Hans:
<voice 00018_00064175><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>……啊啊啊啊啊。
掘墓者居然被打败了……<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64175.zh-Hant:
<voice 00018_00064175><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>……啊啊啊啊啊，
掘墓者竟然被幹掉了……<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64176.en:
<voice 00156_00064176><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>Forgive us! Robbing Prince Toma's tomb was
just a crime of opportunity, honest.<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64176.ja:
<voice 00156_00064176><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「すいませんでしたっ！
　トーマ王子の墓に　手を出したのは
　ほんの　デキごころ　なんですぅ。<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64176.ko:
<voice 00156_00064176><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>: 잘못했습니다!
　토마 왕자님의 무덤에 손을 댄 건
　진짜 우연이었어요.<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64176.zh-Hans:
<voice 00156_00064176><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>对不起！
我们是一时鬼迷心窍
才想对托玛王子的墓下手的。<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64176.zh-Hant:
<voice 00156_00064176><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>真是非常抱歉！
我們一時鬼迷心竅，
才對托瑪王子的墓下手。<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64177.en: <voice 00236_00064177><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>...Eh? Where did we take Prince Toma's body?<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64177.ja:
<voice 00236_00064177><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「……え？　トーマ王子の遺体を
　どこへ　やったのか……ですって？<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64177.ko:
<voice 00236_00064177><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>: ……네? 토마 왕자님의 시신을
　어쨌냐……고요?<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64177.zh-Hans:
<voice 00236_00064177><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>……诶？你问……我们把
托玛王子的遗体弄去哪里了？<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64177.zh-Hant:
<voice 00236_00064177><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>……什麼？你問我們把
托瑪王子的遺體弄去哪了……？<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64178.en:
<voice 00313_00064178><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>Nnn-nonsense! We'd never do something as
extreme as lay our hands on an actual
corpse!!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64178.ja:
<voice 00313_00064178><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「めめめ　めっそうもない！
　ご遺体に　手を出すなんて
　そんな　おっかないこと　できませんよ！！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64178.ko:
<voice 00313_00064178><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>: 다, 다, 다, 당치도 않습니다!
　감히 시신에 손을 대다니
　그런 무엄한 짓을 어떻게 해요!!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64178.zh-Hans:
<voice 00313_00064178><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>我我我、我们怎么可能会做那种事！
偷遗体这种缺德事
我们是绝对不会干的！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64178.zh-Hant:
<voice 00313_00064178><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>絕絕絕、絕無此事！
偷遺體這種缺德事，
我們是絕對不會幹的！！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64179.en:
<voice 00374_00064179><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>The prince's coffin was already open when
we got there, and there was no corpse
inside.<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64179.ja:
<voice 00374_00064179><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「王子の棺は　最初から　フタが開いてましたし
　中には　遺体も　ありませんでした。<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64179.ko:
<voice 00374_00064179><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>: 왕자님의 관은 처음부터 뚜껑이 열려 있었고
　안에는 시신이고 뭐고 없었어요.<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64179.zh-Hans:
<voice 00374_00064179><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>王子的棺材一开始就是开着盖子的，
里面根本就没有遗体。<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64179.zh-Hant:
<voice 00374_00064179><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>王子的棺材一開始就是打開的，
裡面根本就沒有遺體。<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64180.en:
<voice 00447_00064180><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>We thought that was strange, but the
treasure was there for the taking. That's
the truth. Please believe us.<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64180.ja:
<voice 00447_00064180><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「変だとは思いましたけど　お宝は残ってたので
　それだけ　もらってきたんですよぉ。
　本当なんです。信じてくださいぃ。<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64180.ko:
<voice 00447_00064180><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>: 이상하긴 했지만 보물은 남아 있어서
　그것만 갖고 나왔어요.
　진짜예요. 믿어 주세요.<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64180.zh-Hans:
<voice 00447_00064180><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>我也觉得很奇怪，但是里面的宝贝都还在，
我们就把宝贝都拿走了。
我说的都是真的，请相信我。<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64180.zh-Hant:
<voice 00447_00064180><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>我也覺得很奇怪，但裡面的寶貝都還在，
我們就把寶貝都拿走了。
我說的是真的，你要相信我！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64181.en:
<voice 00533_00064181><start_lip_sync n02211 _normal m00001>That's right. The motto of the desert mole
is, "Rob the tomb, not human rights".
We'd never defile a corpse!<stop_lip_animation n02211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64181.ja:
<voice 00533_00064181><start_lip_sync n02211 _normal m00001>「そうよ。砂漠の土竜のモットーは
　墓荒らしても　人権荒らすな。
　遺体に　手を出すなんて　しないんだから！<stop_lip_animation n02211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64181.ko:
<voice 00533_00064181><start_lip_sync n02211 _normal m00001>: 맞아. 사막의 두더지의 좌우명은
　무덤은 파헤쳐도 인권은 해치지 마라.
　시신에 손대는 짓은 안 해!<stop_lip_animation n02211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64181.zh-Hans:
<voice 00533_00064181><start_lip_sync n02211 _normal m00001>没错，我们沙漠土龙的信条是——
墓穴可以偷，死者不能辱。
遗体的主意我们是绝对不会打的！<stop_lip_animation n02211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64181.zh-Hant:
<voice 00533_00064181><start_lip_sync n02211 _normal m00001>對啊，我們沙漠土龍的信條是
墓穴可以偷，死者不能辱。
我們是絕對不會打遺體的主意的！<stop_lip_animation n02211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64182.en:
<voice 00608_00064182><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>We'll disband the graverobbers's group and
change our ways! Please, please look the
other way!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64182.ja:
<voice 00608_00064182><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「盗掘団は解散して　悔い改めますんで
　どうか　どうか　見逃してくだせぇまし！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64182.ko:
<voice 00608_00064182><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>: 도굴단은 해산하고 반성할 테니까
　제발 제발 용서해 주세요!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64182.zh-Hans:
<voice 00608_00064182><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>我会解散盗墓团，悔过自新的。
拜托，拜托，请饶我们一命吧！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64182.zh-Hant:
<voice 00608_00064182><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>我會解散盜墓團，改過自新。
拜託你，求求你放過我們吧！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64183.ja: <voice 00659_00064183><start_lip_sync n02210 _normal m00001>「うおーん。うおおーん！！<stop_lip_animation n02210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64183.ko: <voice 00659_00064183><start_lip_sync n02210 _normal m00001>: 으아앙. 으아아앙!!<stop_lip_animation n02210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64183.zh-Hans: <voice 00659_00064183><start_lip_sync n02210 _normal m00001>呜呜～呜呜呜！<stop_lip_animation n02210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64183.zh-Hant: <voice 00659_00064183><start_lip_sync n02210 _normal m00001>嗚哇──！嗚哇哇──！！<stop_lip_animation n02210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64184.ja: <voice 00957_00064184><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>「……そこまでだ！<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64184.zh-Hant: <voice 00957_00064184><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>……到此為止！<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64185.en:
<voice 00987_00064185><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>You Pyramid raiding, group of graverobbers,
the desert moles!
<auto_br=3500>
Al-Ahagiro Kingdom's Crime Control Case Worker,
Darash, is here to arrest you all!<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64185.ja:
<voice 00987_00064185><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>「ピラミッドを荒らす盗掘団　砂漠の土竜！
　アラハギーロ王国　犯罪取り締まり担当官
　ダラシュが　貴様たちを　逮捕しに来たぞ！<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64185.ko:
<voice 00987_00064185><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>: 피라미드를 파헤치는 도굴단 사막의 두더지!
　아라하길로 왕국 범죄 단속 담당관
　다라시가 네놈들을 체포하러 왔다!<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64185.zh-Hans:
<voice 00987_00064185><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>破坏金字塔的盗墓团——沙漠土龙！
消灭艾拉哈奇罗王国犯罪的负责人——
达拉修前来逮捕你们了！<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64185.zh-Hant:
<voice 00987_00064185><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>破壞金字塔的盜墓團──沙漠土龍！
消滅艾拉哈奇羅王國犯罪的負責人──
達拉修前來逮捕你們了！<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64186.en:
<voice 01313_00064186><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>We were worried about you, so we came here.
Luckily we were just in time.<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64186.ja:
<voice 01313_00064186><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>「キミのことが　心配で来たんだけど
　ちょうど　いいところに　出くわしちゃったよ。<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64186.ko:
<voice 01313_00064186><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>: 네가 걱정되어서 와 봤는데
　마침 적당한 타이밍에 마주쳤군.<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64186.zh-Hans:
<voice 01313_00064186><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>我担心你就过来看看，
没想到我来得正好。<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64186.zh-Hant:
<voice 01313_00064186><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>我很擔心你，就過來看看，
沒想到我來得正好。<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64187.en:
<voice 01363_00064187><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>Sorry, but we're taking these guys back to
Al-Ahagiro. Thank you for your help in
stopping them.<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64187.ja:
<voice 01363_00064187><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>「悪いけど　コイツらは　ボクらが捕まえて
　アラハギーロに　連行していくよ。
　いやあ。本当に　ご苦労だったねえ。<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64187.ko:
<voice 01363_00064187><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>: 미안하지만 이 녀석들은 우리가 체포해서
　아라하길로로 연행할게.
　정말 고생이 많았어.<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64187.zh-Hans:
<voice 01363_00064187><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>抱歉，我们会把这些家伙
抓回艾拉哈奇罗的。
真是辛苦你了。<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64187.zh-Hant:
<voice 01363_00064187><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>抱歉，我們會把這些傢伙
抓回艾拉哈奇羅。
唉，真是辛苦你了。<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64188.en:
<voice 01428_00064188><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>Heeeey~. We really don't know anything
about the prince's corpse. Please, please...<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64188.ja:
<voice 01428_00064188><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「ひぃいい～。本当に　オレたちは
　王子のご遺体のことは　知らねぇんですぅ。
　どうか　どうか……。<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64188.ko:
<voice 01428_00064188><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>: 히이이익~ 정말로 우린
　왕자님의 시신에 대해서는 모른다니까요.
　제발 제발…….<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64188.zh-Hans:
<voice 01428_00064188><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>啊啊啊～我们真的不知道
王子的遗体是怎么回事。
饶命啊，饶命啊……<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64188.zh-Hant:
<voice 01428_00064188><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>啊啊啊～我們真的不知道
王子的遺體是怎麼回事啊。
饒命啊，饒命啊……<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64189.en:
<voice 01593_00064189><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>If you have something to say, let's hear it at the
castle. Come on. Get moving!<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64189.ja:
<voice 01593_00064189><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>「言いたいことがあるなら　城で聞こう。
　ほらほら。キリキリと歩けよ。<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64189.ko:
<voice 01593_00064189><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>: 할 말이 있다면 성에 가서 해라.
　자, 빨리빨리 걸어.<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64189.zh-Hans:
<voice 01593_00064189><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>有什么想说的，回城再说吧。
走了走了，都给我走快点。<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64189.zh-Hant:
<voice 01593_00064189><start_lip_sync n02429 _normal m00001>有什麼想說的回城裡再說吧。
走啦走啦，都給我走快點。<stop_lip_animation n02429 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64190.en:
<voice 01943_00064190><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>Believe meee. It's true. When I was about
to enter Royal Tomb, someone came out
from inside.<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64190.ja:
<voice 01943_00064190><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「信じてくだせえ～。本当なんですよぉ。
　オレが　王家の墓に入ろうとしたとき
　中から　誰か　出てきたんですぅ。<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64190.ko:
<voice 01943_00064190><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>: 믿어 주세요~ 진짜예요.
　제가 왕가의 무덤에 들어가려 했을 때
　안에서 누가 나왔어요.<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64190.zh-Hans:
<voice 01943_00064190><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>请相信我～是真的。
我进王家陵墓的时候
看到有人从里面出来了。<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64190.zh-Hant:
<voice 01943_00064190><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>請相信我～我說的是真的。
當我正要進入王家之墓時，
正好有人從裡面出來了。<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64191.en:
<voice 01998_00064191><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>I didn't get a good look at their face, but they're
the one who stole the prince's body, no mistaaaking
it!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64191.ja:
<voice 01998_00064191><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「カオとか　よく見えなかったけど
　きっと　そいつが　王子の遺体を盗んだに
　まちがいありません～！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64191.ko:
<voice 01998_00064191><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>: 얼굴은 잘 안 보였지만
　그놈이 왕자님의 시신을 훔친 범인이
　틀림없어요~!<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64191.zh-Hans:
<voice 01998_00064191><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>我虽然没有看清楚脸，
但肯定是那家伙
偷了王子的遗体！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64191.zh-Hant:
<voice 01998_00064191><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>我沒有看清他的長相，
但一定就是那個人
偷走了王子的遺體啦～！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64192.ja: <voice 02103_00064192><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>「ひぃあああ～！！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64192.zh-Hans: <voice 02103_00064192><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>不要啊啊啊～！！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64192.zh-Hant: <voice 02103_00064192><start_lip_sync n02209 _normal m00001>不要啊啊啊～！！<stop_lip_animation n02209 CLOSE_MOUTH>
